data.eml:eml: The phylogenetic relationships of the two-winged South American Leptophlebiidae genera revisited with first description of the male imago of Bessierus Thomas & Orth (Insecta: Ephemeroptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Domínguez, Eduardo, Cuezzo, María Gabriela, Clavier, Simón (2019): The phylogenetic relationships of the two-winged South American Leptophlebiidae genera revisited with first description of the male imago of Bessierus Thomas & Orth (Insecta: Ephemeroptera). Zootaxa 4674 (3): 375-385, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.3.6
